text: Stary Gierałtów () is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Stronie Śląskie, within Kłodzko County, Lower Silesian Voivodeship, in south- western Poland, near the border with the Czech Republic. Prior to 1945 it was in Germany. It lies approximately east of Stronie Śląskie, south-east of Kłodzko, and south of the regional capital Wrocław. The village has a population of 320. ==References== Category:Villages in Kłodzko County
title: Stary Gierałtów
